name: SecondAndThirdDegreeBurn
title: Second and Third Degree Burn
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of second or third degree burn.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of second, third, partial thickness or full thickness burn.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
